metadata.title: CVE-2023-52426 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: libexpat through 2.5.0 allows recursive XML Entity Expansion if XML_DTD isundefined at compile time.

criterions.comment: swish-e package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
insighttoolkit4 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
cadaver package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
gdcm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
ayttm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
cableswig package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.

matanza package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
tdom package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
vtk package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
smart package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
